attributes.action: Create an additional road tax for towed caravans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Towed caravans create heavier C02 emissions due to the increased load on the engine of the towing vehicle.They are also a cause of considerable congestion, road wear, and traffic delays. They should be subject to an environmental tax like any other road vehicle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
